Name: R from: Light
name: r_from_light
description:
R from: Light

Eighty seven pictures from unknown neighbors laundry.
They were made between Monday, December 19th 2011 and Tuesday, September 25th 2012.

The numbers are the ones in the filename of the pictures in the camera, that is to say the order the pictures were taken during the ten months. The jump from one number to the next corresponds to the other pictures made during that time.
